Method.Name: jcolibri.extensions.web.method.WebPreCycleMethod
Method.Description: Pre cycle method that launches the web server and loads the case base

Method.Name: jcolibri.extensions.web.method.WebPostCycleMethod
Method.Description: Post cycle method that stops the web server and stores the case base

Method.Name: jcolibri.extensions.web.method.ObtainWebQueryMethod
Method.Description: Obtains the query from the web server

Parameter.Name: Case Structure
Parameter.Description: XML file generated by jCOLIBRI tools

Parameter.Name: Time out
Parameter.Description: Maximum time that cycle waits for the query

Method.Name: jcolibri.extensions.web.method.CBRWebMethod
Method.Description: Main CBR method that will divide CBR process in the four typical tasks and some extra tasks for cycle synchronization with the web server

Method.Name: jcolibri.extensions.web.method.RetrieveComputationalForWebServerMethod
Method.Description: Simple retrieve strategy that sends the cases to the Web Server

SubTasks.SubTask: Send Cases to Web Server task

Method.Name: jcolibri.extensions.web.method.SendCasesToWebServerMethod
Method.Description: Sends retrieved cases to the Web Server

Competencies.Competence: Send Cases to Web Server task
